title: Daily Coffee Shop
description: Practical English for ordering and chatting in a cafe.

sentences.english: I would like to order a large iced Americano, please.
sentences.korean: 아이스 아메리카노 라지 사이즈 한 잔 주문할게요.

sentences.english: Would you like some room for cream in your coffee?
sentences.korean: 커피에 크림 넣을 공간을 좀 남겨드릴까요?
